function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of consideration for indoor air quality and ventilation may lead to the spread of airborne diseases.","Impact":"Increased risk of respiratory infections and reduced indoor air quality, leading to negative health outcomes.","Mitigation":"Implementing ventilation systems and air purifiers, and enforcing policies for indoor air quality management and maintenance.","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, air purifiers, indoor air quality monitors, and filtration systems.","People":"Occupants, building users, and visitors.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, and architects."},{"Description":"Inadequate maintenance of water features may lead to the proliferation of waterborne diseases and microbial contamination.","Impact":"Increased risk of waterborne diseases, reduced water safety, and compromised public health.","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance and cleaning of water features, use of water treatment technology, and adherence to water safety regulations.","Technologies":"Water treatment systems, UV disinfection, water safety monitoring technology, and regular cleaning equipment.","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and the general public.","Owner":"Facility managers, building maintenance personnel, and water feature operators."},{"Description":"Lack of greenery maintenance may lead to the accumulation of allergens, pests, and pathogens, contributing to health hazards.","Impact":"Increased risk of allergies, pest infestations, and exposure to harmful pathogens, leading to health issues and discomfort.","Mitigation":"Regular inspection and maintenance of greenery, pest management practices, and adherence to green building maintenance protocols.","Technologies":"Integrated pest management systems, greenery monitoring technology, allergen detection devices, and sustainable landscaping tools.","People":"Occupants, maintenance staff, and landscaping personnel.","Owner":"Building managers, landscape architects, and facility maintenance teams."}]}
